title: Add plugin field support to OpenCodeConfigSchema
description:
When users add "plugin": ["opencode-beads"] to their OpenCode config, it gets stripped on restart because the field is not defined in the schema.

Root Cause: The OpenCodeConfigSchema in /workspace/repos/opencode-manager/shared/src/schemas/settings.ts doesn't include the plugin field, so Zod's .parse() strips unknown fields.

Fix Needed: Add plugin: z.array(z.string()).optional() to the OpenCodeConfigSchema.

Acceptance Criteria:
1. The plugin field should be added to OpenCodeConfigSchema in shared/src/schemas/settings.ts
2. The field should be optional array of strings: plugin: z.array(z.string()).optional()
3. When users add plugin config, it should persist after restart
4. Test that the schema accepts the plugin field

title: Fix command dialog not loading existing values when editing
description:
In `/workspace/repos/opencode-manager/frontend/src/components/settings/CommandDialog.tsx`, when you click "Edit" on an existing command, the dialog opens but all fields appear empty instead of showing the existing values.

**Root Cause**: The form is initialized once with `defaultValues` that use `editingCommand`, but when `editingCommand` changes (user clicks edit), the form doesn't automatically update because `defaultValues` are only set at mount time.

**Fix Needed**: Use `useEffect` to reset the form when `editingCommand` changes.
acceptance_criteria:
1. When clicking "Edit" on an existing command, the dialog should show the current values (template, description, agent, model, etc.)
2. The name field should be disabled (as it already is)
3. Form should reset when dialog closes
